member.name: SOURCE_MEDIA
member.summary: TheSOURCE_MEDIA structure is used with theSPFILENOTIFY_NEEDMEDIA notification to pass source media information.

member.name: SOURCE_MEDIA.Reserved
member.summary: This member is not currently used.

member.name: SOURCE_MEDIA.Tagfile
member.summary: Optional tag file that can be used to identify the source media.

member.name: SOURCE_MEDIA.Description
member.summary: Human-readable description of the source media.

member.name: SOURCE_MEDIA.SourcePath
member.summary: Path to the source that needs the new media.

member.name: SOURCE_MEDIA.SourceFile
member.summary: Source file to be retrieved from the new media.

summary.para: Copy style information that modifies how errors are handled. This member can be one or more of the following values.
Inform the user that skipping the file may affect the installation.
Do not offer the user the option to skip the file.
The current source file is continued in another cabinet file.
Do not offer the user the option to browse.
